Variable.desc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log level for the messages coming from the Spoon.

desc: Show a popup window with the currently selected word in lexicon, notes, online help
doc:
Show a popup window with the currently selected word in lexicon, notes, online help

The spoon uses hs.urlevent.openURL("dict://" .. text) 

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/IFLookupSelection.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/IFLookupSelection.spoon.zip)
